wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Brown (26 October 1919 – May 2000) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper and spent most of his career with Ipswich Town. He was also a Commando during World War II.

response: *Tom Brown (tackle) (1890–1972), former "Ohio League" football player, played collegiately at Vanderbilt University
